ayas.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayas.translation: In the Name of Allah, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
ayas.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

ayas.arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِى بِيَدِهِ ٱلْمُلْكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Blessed is He in whose hands is all sovereignty, and He has power over all things.
ayas.transliteration: tabārakal ladhī biyadihil mulku wahuwa `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَٱلْحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبْلُوَكُمْ أَيُّكُمْ أَحْسَنُ عَمَلًا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
ayas.translation: He, who created death and life that He may test you [to see] which of you is best in conduct. And He is the All-mighty, the All-forgiving.
ayas.transliteration: alladhī khalaqal mawta wal ḥayāta liyabluwakum ayyukum aḥsanu `amalā ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ghafūr

ayas.arabic: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَبْعَ سَمَـٰوَٰتٍ طِبَاقًا ۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلْقِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِن تَفَـٰوُتٍ ۖ فَٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ هَلْ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٍ
ayas.translation: He created seven heavens in layers. You do not see any discordance in the creation of the All-beneficent. Look again! Do you see any flaw?
ayas.transliteration: alladhī khalaqa sab`a samāwātin ṭibāqā ۖ mā tarā fī khalqir raḥmāni min tafāwut ۖ farji`il baṣara hal tarā min fuṭūr

ayas.arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرْجِعِ ٱلْبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيْنِ يَنقَلِبْ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْبَصَرُ خَاسِئًا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Look again, once more. Your look will return to you humbled and weary.
ayas.transliteration: thummar-ji`il baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilaykal baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīr

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا رُجُومًا لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ ۖ وَأَعْتَدْنَا لَهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayas.translation: We have certainly adorned the lowest heaven with lamps, and made them [the means of pelting] missiles against the devils, and We have prepared for them a punishment of the Blaze.
ayas.transliteration: walaqad zayyannas samā-ad dunyā bimaṣābīḥa waja`alnāhā rujūmal lishhayāṭīn ۖ wa-a`tadnā lahum `adhābas sa`īr

ayas.arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِرَبِّهِمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
ayas.translation: For those who defy their Lord is the punishment of hell, and it is an evil destination.
ayas.transliteration: walilladhīna kafarū birabbihim `adhābu jahannam ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

ayas.arabic: إِذَآ أُلْقُوا۟ فِيهَا سَمِعُوا۟ لَهَا شَهِيقًا وَهِىَ تَفُورُ
ayas.translation: When they are thrown in it, they hear it blaring, as it seethes,
ayas.transliteration: idhā ulqū fīhā sami`ū lahā shahīqan wahiya tafūr

ayas.arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلْغَيْظِ ۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلْقِىَ فِيهَا فَوْجٌ سَأَلَهُمْ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمْ يَأْتِكُمْ نَذِيرٌ
ayas.translation: almost exploding with rage. Whenever a group is thrown in it, its keepers will ask them, ‘Did not any warner come to you?’
ayas.transliteration: takādu tamayyazu minal ghayẓ ۖ kullamā ulqiya fīhā fawjun sa-alahum khazanatuhā alam ya-tikum nadhīr

ayas.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٌ فَكَذَّبْنَا وَقُلْنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَىْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ كَبِيرٍ
ayas.translation: They will say, ‘Yes, a warner did come to us, but we impugned [him] and said, ‘Allah did not send down anything; you are only in great error.’
ayas.transliteration: qālū balā qad jā-anā nadhīrun fakadhhabnā waqulnā mā nazzalallāhu min shay-in in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīr

ayas.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayas.translation: And they will say, ‘Had we listened or applied reason, we would not have been among inmates of the Blaze.’
ayas.transliteration: waqālū law kunnā nasma`u aw na`qilu mā kunnā fī aṣ-ḥābis sa`īr

ayas.arabic: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًا لِّأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayas.translation: Thus they will admit their sin. So away with the inmates of the Blaze!
ayas.transliteration: fa`tarafū bidhanbihim fasuḥqal li-aṣ-ḥābis sa`īr

ayas.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ كَبِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Indeed for those who fear their Lord in secret there will be forgiveness and a great reward.
ayas.transliteration: innal ladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil ghaybi lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīr

ayas.arabic: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayas.translation: Speak secretly, or do so openly, indeed He knows well what is in the breasts.
ayas.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awij-harū bih ۖ innahu `alīmun bidhātiṣ ṣudūr

ayas.arabic: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
ayas.translation: Would He who has created not know? And He is the All-attentive, the All-aware.
ayas.transliteration: alā ya`lamu man khalaqa wahuwallaṭīful khabīr

ayas.arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ
ayas.translation: It is He who made the earth tractable for you; so walk on its flanks and eat of His provision, and towards Him is the resurrection.
ayas.transliteration: huwal ladhī ja`ala lakumul-arḍa dhalūlan famshū fī manākibihā wakulū min rizqih ۖ wa ilayhin nushūr

ayas.arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ
ayas.translation: Are you secure that He who is in the sky will not make the earth swallow you while it quakes?
ayas.transliteration: a-amintum man fis samā-i an yakhsifa bikumul-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūr

ayas.arabic: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ
ayas.translation: Are you secure that He who is in the sky will not unleash upon you a rain of stones? Soon you will know how My warning has been!
ayas.transliteration: am amintum man fis samā-i an yursila `alaykum ḥāṣibā ۖ fasata`lamūna kayfa nadhīr

ayas.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayas.translation: Certainly those who were before them had impugned [My apostles]; but then how was My rebuttal!
ayas.transliteration: walaqad kadhhabal ladhīna min qablihim fakayfa kāna nakīr

ayas.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ
ayas.translation: Have they not regarded the birds above them spreading and closing their wings? No one sustains them except the All-beneficent. Indeed, He watches all things.
ayas.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilaṭ ṭayri fawqahum ṣāffātin wayaqbiḍn ۚ mā yumsikuhunna illar raḥmān ۚ innahu bikulli shay-in baṣīr

ayas.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ
ayas.translation: Who is it that is your host who may help you, besides the All-beneficent? The faithless only dwell in delusion.
ayas.transliteration: amman hādhal ladhī huwa jundul lakum yanṣurukum min dūnir raḥmān ۚ inil kāfirūna illā fī ghurūr

ayas.arabic: أَمَّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّ وَنُفُورٍ
ayas.translation: Who is it that may provide for you if He withholds His provision? Indeed, they persist in defiance and aversion.
ayas.transliteration: amman hādhal ladhī yarzuqukum in amsaka rizqah ۚ bal lajjū fī `utuwwin wanufūr

ayas.arabic: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Is he who walks prone on his face better guided, or he who walks upright on a straight path?
ayas.transliteration: afaman yamshī mukibban `alā wajhihi ahdā amman yamshī sawiyyan `alā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

ayas.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘It is He who created you, and made for you hearing, eyesight, and hearts. Little do you thank.’
ayas.transliteration: qul huwal ladhī ansha-akum waja`ala lakumus sam`a wal-abṣāra wal-af-idah ۖ qalīlan mā tashkurūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘It is He who created you on the earth, and toward Him you will be mustered.’
ayas.transliteration: qul huwal ladhī dhara-akum fil-arḍi wa ilayhi tuḥsharūn

ayas.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
ayas.translation: They say, ‘When will this promise be fulfilled, if you are truthful?’
ayas.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhal wa`du in kuntum ṣādiqīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘Its knowledge is only with Allah; I am only a manifest warner.’
ayas.transliteration: qul innamal `il-mu `indallāhi wa innamā ana nadhīrun mubīn

ayas.arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةً سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ
ayas.translation: When they see it brought near, the countenances of the faithless will be contorted, and [they will be] told, ‘This is what you were asking for!’
ayas.transliteration: falammā ra-awhu zulfatan sī-at wujūhul ladhīna kafarū waqīla hādhal ladhī kuntum bihi tadda`ūn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘Tell me, whether Allah destroys me and those who are with me, or He has mercy on us, who will shelter the faithless from a painful punishment?’
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytum in ahlakaniyallāhu wa man ma`iya aw raḥimanā faman yujīrul kāfirīna min `adhābin alīm

ayas.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘He is the All-beneficent; we have faith in Him, and in Him do we trust. Soon you will know who is in manifest error.’
ayas.transliteration: qul huwar raḥmānu āmannā bihi wa`alayhi tawakkalnā ۖ fasata`lamūna man huwa fī ḍalālin mubīn

ayas.arabic: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍ مَّعِينٍۭ
ayas.translation: Say, ‘Tell me, should your water sink down [into the ground], who will bring you running water?’
ayas.transliteration: qul ara aytum in aṣbaḥa mā-ukum ghawran faman ya-tīkum bimā-in ma`īn
